title: Player Behavior vs Memes and Games
body:
Player Behavior discussions: 
(https://www.welivesecurity.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/angrymob.jpg)
Memes and Games
(https://www.lyfemarketing.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/people-happy-cheering.jpg)

I hope this works well or it'll look really dumb.

replies.body: Dang with this power I might become the new laughing fish!

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Ww1MpTf7,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-03-19T07:28:08.435+0000)
>
> https://i.imgur.com/X36KHxs.gif[/img]

But really I feel like the difference between player behavior and memes and games is that player behavior people still resist the fact that life sucks and memes and games has resigned itself already and just makes the best of it.

Lol that is actually quite possibly the case. Here in M&G, we are not looking for a solution to life’s problems anymore. We just want to ignore our own problems and laugh every once and awhile. 

PB and Gameplay meanwhile are triggered about how unfair and frustrating things are. They haven’t realized that it isn’t just league, that’s just how all of life is. So laugh at it, mock it, and make the most out of it lol

https://i.giphy.com/media/vmzWKN2eoVrvq/giphy.gif

Also don't worry the images worked. But you don't need to put parentheses around the links, just post the link.
And If it's imgur put \[/img\] after it for better energy

Player Behaviour vs memes and games 

Darkness vs Light
Dad when will you come back from the store it's been 16 years.
